duties_responsibilities.duty: Mentor, train, and coach team members in technical performance, client engagement, and leadership skills.
Lead project teams and provide direction throughout project delivery life cycle.
Own business development for current and potential partnerships. Represent PF as an industry leader in client interactions.
Present monthly resource projections to leadership team and strategically create structures and processes for project team members' enablement.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Life Science, Engineering, or related discipline and/or comparable military experience.
